If you would like to know the addresses of places you visit or as you drive by them then this is the app for you! start up the application and wait for your position to be found, once your location has been determined your location will be zoomed into and the address will display beneath the map, you can also see your position in real time as you move from place to place so you will know exactly where you are.

With this application you can send your current location to anyone in your contacts, use it if you are lost, needing help or someone is trying to find you.This application uses GPS in order to find your exact location and provide pin point accuracy.How it works: once your location has been determined the contacts text field will become activated and you can start typing the name of the contact you want to send your location to, the application will start prompting you with suggestions based on your input. you can then type in an optional message to your contact, if you leave the text field blank then a default message will be sent with your location. Pop up messages will display when the message has been sent and delivered.

Create an Android App that will allow a user to find the mobile phoneâ€™s current location using the GPS Location Provider. Using the Geocoder, you can determine the street address of your current location. Update the street address whenever the device moves.

Using Question 1 above as a guideline, you are now required to create an application that combines the use of GPS (location based) and SMS technology. You may conceptualise, design and code your own app based on your own idea. Try to make your GPS/ SMS app useful to a specific business, to non-profit organisation (NGO), or to education.
